Invoice-PO Matching Tool

How to use this tool:

  1. Upload your invoice files (PDF, Excel, or CSV)
  2. Upload your purchase order (PO) files
  3. Set your desired matching threshold (higher means stricter matching)
  4. Click "Match and Preview" to see the results
Select one or more invoice files to process
Select one or more purchase order files
Higher values require closer matches between invoices and POs
